sentences.sContent: Business was booming , and money wasn’t a problem.
sentences.sCn: 生意非常兴隆，钱已不是问题。

sentences.sContent: Tourism on the island has boomed.
sentences.sCn: 岛上的旅游业迅速发展。

sentences.sContent: ...their popularity didn't boom until televisions became popular a decade or so later...

phrases.pCn: 超音波爆声；音爆（等于sonic bang）
婴儿潮一代；生育高峰代

remMethod.val: 拟炮、  雷、  波浪等的隆隆声

words.tran: 兴旺的，繁荣的；大受欢迎的
生育高峰中出生的人；赶往新兴地区安家的人；发出隆隆声者；发育完全的雄袋鼠
兴旺（boom的ing形式）；发出隆隆声

trans.tranCn: 激增， 繁荣， 迅速发展； 发出隆隆声
trans.tranOther: if business, trade, or a particular area is booming, it is increasing and being very successful

trans.tranCn: 激增，繁荣，迅速发展；隆隆声，嗡嗡声
trans.tranOther: a quick increase of business activity
